1112198725278027778.text: Ok. Since some of y’all don’t know: Please (and I cannot stress this enough) pay NO attention to claims like these that are based off of fraudulent studies (Wakefield 1998) that were discredited by much more credible studies and even called “irresponsible & dishonest” by the GMChttps://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/449525268529815552 …

1112198727882674176.text: It’s irresponsible to believe in such claims without knowing where they’re coming from. With that said... PLEASE (for the sake of everyone and their future/current kids) VACCINATE YOUR KIDS
